thread.title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Doubles Results

title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Doubles Results
text: April 16, 2018 / 4:54 PM / Updated an hour ago ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Doubles Results Reuters Staff 2 Min Read Apr 16 (OPTA) - Results from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Doubles matches on Monday .. 1st Round .. 1-Lukasz Kubot (POL) and (Bye) Marcelo Melo (BRA) 6-Jean-Julien Rojer (AHO) (Bye) and Horia Tecau (ROU) 4-Bob Bryan (USA) and (Bye) Mike Bryan (USA) Romain Arneodo (MON) and beat Santiago Gonzalez (MEX) 6-4 7-6 Hugo Nys (FRA) and Ben McLachlan (JPN) Pablo Cuevas (URU) and beat Damir Dzumhur (BIH) and 6-2 3-6 1-0(6) Marcel Granollers (ESP) Aisam-Ul-Haq Qureshi (PAK) 5-Pierre-Hugues Herbert (Bye) (FRA) and Nicolas Mahut (FRA) 8-Ivan Dodig (CRO) and (Bye) Rajeev Ram (USA) Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) and beat Adrian Mannarino (FRA) and 7-6(3) 6-2 David Goffin (BEL) Fabrice Martin (FRA) Alexander Zverev (GER) and beat Andres Molteni (ARG) and 6-2 4-6 1-0(8) Mischa Zverev (GER) Diego Schwartzman (ARG) 3-Oliver Marach (AUT) and (Bye) Mate Pavic (CRO) 7-Jamie Murray (GBR) and (Bye) Bruno Soares (BRA) 2-Henri Kontinen (FIN) and (Bye) John Peers (AUS)
